citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:45 pm on
07-Nov-16. The license holder was contacted by phone upon arriving at the facility. She indicated that she was
away from the facility and would not be returning for several hours.
A responsible person shall be available to accompany inspection during business hours.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:45 pm on
07-Nov-16.  The license holder was contacted by phone upon arriving at the facility.  She indicated that she was
away from the facility and would not be returning for several hours.
A responsible person shall be available to accompany inspection during business hours.
